about.details:
Incorporated in May 1972, Indobell Insulation Limited manufactures and manufactures insulation products, including nodulated and granulated wool (mineral and ceramic fibre nodules) and prefabricated thermal insulation jackets. The company's products are used in residential, commercial, and industrial applications alongside various related insulation materials.

The company's product range includes

  • Nodulated/Granulated Wool which includes
    • Ceramic Fibres Nodules
    • Mineral Fibre Nodules
  • Pre-fabricated Thermal Insulation Jackets

The company provides customized insulation solutions tailored to each client's needs, including specific sizes, shapes, and densities for projects involving 3D and 2D designs, manufacturing drawings, and thermal analysis.

The company's manufacturing units are situated in West Bengal and Maharastra. The company has received certifications for ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management System), ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management System), and ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety Management System) for producing Nodulated Fibers and for thermal insulation materials.

As of December 30, 2024, the company employs 31 people in various departments.

  • Experienced Management Team
  • Smooth flow of operations
  • Well-defined organizational structure
  • Well Established Manufacturing Facility
  • Quality assurance and accreditations
  • Diversified Product portfolio

faqs.question: What is the Indobell Insulation IPO?
faqs.answer:
Indobell Insulation IPO is a SME IPO of 2205000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.14 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹46 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on January 6, 2025, and closes on January 8, 2025.

Integrated Registry Management Services Private Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Indobell Insulation IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Indobell Insulation IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Indobell Insulation IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Indobell Insulation IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Indobell Insulation IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Indobell Insulation IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Indobell Insulation IPO opens on January 6, 2025 and closes on January 8, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Indobell Insulation IPO?
faqs.answer: Indobell Insulation IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,38,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Indobell Insulation IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Indobell Insulation IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Indobell Insulation IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Indobell Insulation IPO will be done on Thursday, January 9, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, January 10, 2025. Check the Indobell Insulation IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Indobell Insulation IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Indobell Insulation IPO listing date is on Monday, January 13, 2025.
